title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Networking Fundamentals: Connect, secure and scale (NET208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 网络基础：连接、保护和扩展 (NET208)
abstract: Dive into AWS networking foundations, starting with the fundamentals of Amazon VPC in a single Region. Learn essential skills for IPv4 and IPv6 selection, subnetting, routing, DNS, and security before scaling to global, multi-Region architectures. In this session, explore various VPC connectivity methods, hybrid network integration, and secure traffic management techniques. Discover how to implement private remote access for cloud resources and optimize service-to-service communication while building zero trust architectures. Whether new to AWS or wanting to expand networking building blocks, this session delivers practical insights into best practices and proven architecture patterns for establishing global connectivity.
abstract_cn: 深入了解 AWS 网络基础知识，从单个区域中 Amazon VPC 的基本原理开始。学习 IPv4 和 IPv6 选择、子网划分、路由、DNS 和安全性的基本技能，然后扩展到全球多区域架构。在本次会议中，探索各种 VPC 连接方法、混合网络集成和安全流量管理技术。了解如何为云资源实施私有远程访问，并在构建零信任架构的同时优化服务间通信。无论您是 AWS 新手还是希望扩展网络构建模块，本次会议都将提供有关建立全球连接的最佳实践和经过验证的架构模式的实用见解。
